titles.title: Bonus TEFAP Assistance Act of 2009
Bonus TEFAP Assistance Act of 2009

A bill to amend the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to require the Secretary of Agriculture to help offset the costs of intrastate transportation, storage, and distribution of bonus commodities provided to States and food assistance agencies under the emergency food assistance program.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture, Nutrition, and Forestry.

bill.summary: Bonus TEFAP Assistance Act of 2009 - Amends the Emergency Food Assistance Act of 1983 to direct the Secretary of Agriculture to provide assistance for the costs of intrastate transportation, storage, and distribution of bonus commodities provided to states and food assistance agencies under the emergency food assistance program.
